name: Choo-Choo! Train Rides!
detailed_description:
An accident at the chemical plant led to unthinkable mutations of living organisms, except humans. Animals began to attack everything they see, spreading this infection throughout Europe. The military can't cope with them.

In the game, you play as the character Felix, who got the most difficult test in his life. With the help of his train driving skills. Felix and his companions drive away from the mutated animals that arrived in their hometown. Their main goal is to survive using any possible way.

You will have to drive the locomotive and avoid various obstacles, so as not to crash on a broken railway. You will also have to search in cities for important items to survive in this unfavorable situation.

But how to act, it's up to you.





  • Arcade Mode
  • Story Mode
  • Steam Cloud
  • Realistic train physics! (Not sure)
  • Controller Support
  • Epic fights!
  • Achievements??
  • And more that you can't expect!

Cool isn't it?

An accident at the chemical plant led to unthinkable mutations of living organisms, except humans. Animals began to attack everything they see, spreading this infection throughout Europe. The military can't cope with them.

In the game, you play as the character Felix, who got the most difficult test in his life. With the help of his train driving skills. Felix and his companions drive away from the mutated animals that arrived in their hometown. Their main goal is to survive using any possible way.

short_description: Understand that your old world is no longer exists. You have only a locomotive, a pair of companions and tail of mutated wild animals that are hungry as never before. There are only a couple of ways to survive. Which one is better - it's up to you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8,10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card. Minimum supported resolution: 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3-capable graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card. Minimum supported resolution: 1280x720
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-capable graphics card. Recommended supported resolution: 1280x720.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended.
